content: Notetxt only stores your notes and its related metadata directly in your browser, which means we have no way to view your notes at all. No personal data is collected, shared, or transmitted to external sources.

You can delete an individual note or all stored notes through the user interface via the Note Manager, or via developer tools. Once deleted, the notes will be permanently removed from your device and are unrecoverable.

Notetxt only collects anonymized usage data for analytical purposes. This includes your country, device type, operating system, and any page referrals. Please note that no personal data or notes are collected.
